data.title: Reckless Kelly's "What’s Left Of My Heart" Out on July 19th — Richlynn Group
data.meta_description: Set to Host Their Annual Braun Brothers Reunion Festival August 8 - 10
data.text:
Austin, TX - July 10, 2024 - Americana/Outlaw Country icons Reckless Kelly announce the release of their next single, "What’s Left Of My Heart," on July 19. This will be the second track from their upcoming album, The Last Frontier, set for release in September.

"What's Left Of My Heart" seamlessly blends raw emotion with a rock 'n' roll Stones-esqe groove. Penned by Reckless Kelly frontman, Willy Braun, the single regales the aftermath of love with a vulnerable yet seductive drive, inviting the listeners to pick up the pieces for another go at romance. Pre-save “What’s Left of My Heart” now!

Willy Braun shares insights on the track:

“This song came out really fast and easy, which made me think it probably wasn’t very good. (laughs) Jonathan Tyler, our co-producer, liked it a lot and talked me into giving it a shot We tried to put a little bit of a Rolling Stones vibe on it, while still keeping a solid foot in the country roots. It wound up being one of my favorite tracks on the record, and I’m looking forward to seeing how the crowds react to it live."

The 40th Braun Brothers Reunion - Reckless to Perform with Steve Earle

Reckless Kelly's Willy and Cody Braun, with their brothers Micky and Gary Braun (Micky & The Motorcars) are preparing for their annual festival, The Braun Brothers Reunion, August 8 -10 in Challis, ID. This year the festival features an epic set with Reckless performing as The Dukes with Steve Earle. The brothers welcome more than a dozen of the best Americana and Texas Country artists to their hometown for three nights of incredible jams under the stars. This year’s line-up includes Steve Earle, Reckless Kelly, Wade Bowen, Micky & The Motorcars, Bri Bagwell, Cody Canada, Tylor & The Train Robbers, and more! Three-day, two-day, and single-day tickets are available for the family-friendly festival. Full line-up and tickets here..

Members of Reckless Kelly are available for interviews, as are advance copies of the full album for media preview.

About Reckless Kelly:

Americana/Outlaw Country band Reckless Kelly has been burning up stages with their high-energy blend of rock and country music since 1996. Fronted by central Idaho natives Willy and Cody Braun, the brothers are part of a rich musical legacy that spans three generations. Twenty-five years ago, Willy and Cody moved to Austin, TX, added drummer Jay Nazz to their core, and formed a band that would change Texas's musical history. An indispensable part of the Texas music scene for almost 3 decades, the GRAMMY Award-winning band has released 17 albums. They are the 2024 Outlaw Group for the Year in the Ameripolitian Awards.

Reckless Kelly has built their annual festival, The Braun Brothers Reunion, into a three-day event held in Challis, Idaho, celebrating 40 years in 2024. The band has embarked on the first leg of their 2024 - 2025 The Last Frontier Tour. The members of the band are Willy and Cody Braun, drummer Nazz, Joe Miller on bass, and Geoff Queen on lead guitar. www.recklesskelly.com EPK
